00160   comboOS_->setModel(osModel_);             // Set the model for Distribution selection ComboBox to osModel_.

00166 
00167   kernelModel_ = new WStandardItemModel(this); // Holds list of Kernels of a Distribution Release.
00168   comboKer_->setModel( kernelModel_ );         // Set the model for Kernel selection ComboBox to kernelModel_.
00169   comboKer_->setModelColumn(1);                // shows kernelVersion and architecture together; 2.6.32 - i386
00170 
00171   
00172   // Trigger osSelectionChanged() function when selection changes in Distribution selection combobox.
00173   comboOS_->activated().connect( this, &MainboardsWidget::osSelectionChanged );
00174   
00175   // Trigger releaseSelectionChanged() function when selection changes in Release selection combobox.
00176   comboRel_->activated().connect( this, &MainboardsWidget::releaseSelectionChanged );
00177 
00178   comboRel_->disable();
00179   comboKer_->disable();
00180 
00181 }

00183 
00184 MainboardsWidget* MainboardsWidget::Instance( WContainerWidget* parent)
00185 {
00186   if( parent == 0 ){
00187     if ( !instance_ ){
00188       // we didn't receive a parent and there is no instance of PcimapQueryWidget, so return NULL..
00189       return NULL;
00190     }
00191   }
00192   else{
00193     if( !instance_ ){
00194       instance_ = new MainboardsWidget(parent);
00195     }
00196     // else don't care, we already have an instance we will return that.
00197   }
00198   return instance_;
00199 }

00202 MainboardsWidget::~MainboardsWidget()
00203 {
00204   instance_ = NULL;             // reset static variable.
00205 }

00209 /*
00210   Retrieve all mainboards saved previously as ( boardID, boardName ) pairs.
00211 */
00213 std::multimap<std::string, std::string> getBoardList();
00214 
00215 
00216 void MainboardsWidget::fillMainboards()
00217 {
00218   mainboard_list_ = getBoardList();         // Get list of Mainboards stored in database.
00219 
00220   std::vector<WStandardItem *> result;      // Line to be added to mainboards_ model.
00221   WStandardItem *item;
00222 
00223   // Iterate through the list of retrieved mainboards.
00224   std::multimap<std::string,std::string>::iterator board_iter;
00225   for ( board_iter=mainboard_list_.begin(); board_iter!=mainboard_list_.end(); ++board_iter ){
00226     item = new WStandardItem( board_iter->first );  // boardID column
00227     result.push_back(item);
00228     item = new WStandardItem( board_iter->second ); // boardName column
00229     result.push_back(item);
00230 
00231     mainboards_->appendRow(result);             // Add an entry to the model.
00232     result.clear();
00233   }
00234 }

00238 void MainboardsWidget::bBoardDevices_Click()
00239 {

00242   showBoardConfiguration( board_id );               // Call to switch to Query Devices Result page.

00246 
00247 void MainboardsWidget::showBoardConfiguration( std::string board_id  )
00248 {
00249   std::vector<PciDevice> device_list = getBoardDeviceList( board_id ); // Retrieve PCI Devices of the Mainboard.
00250 
00251   PcimapResultWidget* pcilist;
00252   if ( (pcilist = PcimapResultWidget::Instance()) == NULL ){
00253 
00254     // Switch to PcimapResultWidget with mainboard name passed as argument.
00255     selectWidget( PcimapResultWidget::Instance(device_list,parent_, boardsSelection_->currentText().narrow()) );
00256 
00257     // Remove and delete the current instance of MainboardsWidget.
00258     resetAll();
00259     
00260     WApplication::instance()->setInternalPath("/query_results"); // Set URL to point the new page.
00261   }
00262   else
00263     wApp->log("debug") << "PcimapResultWidget already exists! this should NOT happen!";
00264 }

00270 /*
00271   Retrieve unique device ID list of devices belonging to given mainboard.
00272 */
00274 std::vector<std::string> queryBoardDeviceList( std::string board_id );
00275 
00276 /*
00277   Retrieve hardware codes of a device depending on it's bus type.
00278 */
00280 std::vector<std::string> queryDeviceCodes( std::string udev_id, int bus_type = 1 );
00281 
00282 
00283 std::vector<PciDevice> MainboardsWidget::getBoardDeviceList( std::string board_id  )
00284 {
00285   std::vector<PciDevice> device_list;           // Hold list of PCI Devices to be returned.
00286   
00287   std::vector<std::string> udev_id_list;           // Hold list of Unique device IDs.
00288   udev_id_list = queryBoardDeviceList( board_id ); // Get list of Unique device IDs belonging to the mainboard.
00289 
00290   
00291   // Hold the PCI Device codes as in given index below:
00292   // 0-vendor; 1-device; 2-subvendor; 3-subdevice; 4-class; 5-subclass; 6-progif
00293   std::vector<std::string> device_codes;
00294 
00295 
00296   PciDevice *pci_device;
00297 
00298   // Iterate through the list of retrieved Unique device IDs.
00299   std::vector<std::string>::iterator udev_iter;
00300   for( udev_iter = udev_id_list.begin(); udev_iter != udev_id_list.end(); ++udev_iter ){
00301     
00302     device_codes = queryDeviceCodes( *udev_iter ); // Retrieve Device codes of current PCI device.
00303 
00304     pci_device = new PciDevice();
00305 
00306     pci_device->setVendor( device_codes.at(0) );
00307     pci_device->setDevice( device_codes.at(1) );
00308     pci_device->setSubvendor( device_codes.at(2) );
00309     pci_device->setSubdevice( device_codes.at(3) );
00310     pci_device->setClass( device_codes.at(4) );
00311     pci_device->setSubclass( device_codes.at(5) );
00312     pci_device->setProgif( device_codes.at(6) );
00313 
00314     device_list.push_back(*pci_device);
00315     delete pci_device;
00316   }
00317 
00318   return device_list;
00319 }

00322 
00323 void MainboardsWidget::bDeleteBoard_Click()
00324 {
00325   dialogWarn_ = new WDialog();
00326   dialogWarn_->setWindowTitle("Mainboard");
00327   new WText("Sure you want to delete the selected Mainboard?", dialogWarn_->contents());
00328   new WBreak( dialogWarn_->contents() );
00329   WPushButton *dialogWarnYes = new WPushButton("Yes", dialogWarn_->contents());
00330 
00331   // Sets WDialog::DialogCode to Accepted when Yes is clicked.
00332   dialogWarnYes->clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogWarn_, WDialog::accept) );
00333 
00334   WPushButton *dialogWarnNo = new WPushButton("No", dialogWarn_->contents());
00335   
00336   // Sets WDialog::DialogCode to Rejected when No is clicked.
00337   dialogWarnNo->clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogWarn_, WDialog::reject) );
00338 
00339   dialogWarn_->show();
00340 
00341   // Trigger 'dialogWarn_Close' function on 'dialogWarn_' dialog window close.
00342   dialogWarn_->finished().connect(this, &MainboardsWidget::dialogWarn_Close);
00343 }

00352 
00353 
00354 void MainboardsWidget::deleteBoard()
00355 {
00356   std::string board_id = getBoardIdentifier();      // Get ID of the selected mainboard.
00357   
00358   dialogWarn_ = new WDialog();
00359   
00360   WText *txtWarn = new WText(dialogWarn_->contents());
00361   new WBreak( dialogWarn_->contents() );
00362   WPushButton *dialogWarnClose = new WPushButton("Close", dialogWarn_->contents());
00363 
00364   dialogWarnClose->clicked().connect( SLOT(dialogWarn_, WDialog::accept) );
00365 
00366   if( deleteBoardModel( board_id ) == 0 ){          // Delete the mainboard from database.
00367     dialogWarn_->setWindowTitle("Mainboard");
00368     txtWarn->setText("Mainboard Configuration deleted successfully!");
00369     dialogWarn_->show();
00370   }
00371   else {                                            // Failed to delete the mainboard.
00372     dialogWarn_->setWindowTitle("Mainboard");
00373     txtWarn->setText("There was a FAILURE during deletion of Mainboard!");
00374     dialogWarn_->show();
00375   }
00376 
00377   refreshPage();                // Reload the page to show the changes.
00378 }

00383   Retrieve all OS Distributions.

00386 std::multimap<std::string,std::string> getOsList();

00388 
00389 void MainboardsWidget::fillOsModel()
00390 {
00391   std::multimap<std::string,std::string> osList_;
00392   
00393   osList_ = getOsList();                    // Get list of all OS Distributions.
00394 
00395   std::vector<WStandardItem *> result;      // Line to be added to osModel_. 
00396   WStandardItem *item;
00397 
00398   item = new WStandardItem("0");
00399   result.push_back(item);
00400   item = new WStandardItem("Select OS");
00401   result.push_back(item);
00402   osModel_->appendRow(result);
00403   result.clear();
00404 
00405   // Iterate through the list of retrieved Distributions, while getting their IDs and Names.
00406   std::multimap<std::string,std::string>::iterator os_iter;
00407   for ( os_iter=osList_.begin(); os_iter!=osList_.end(); ++os_iter ){
00408     item = new WStandardItem( os_iter->first );     // osID column
00409     result.push_back(item);
00410     item = new WStandardItem( os_iter->second );    // osName column
00411     result.push_back(item);
00412 
00413     osModel_->appendRow(result);
00414     result.clear();
00415   }
00416   
00417 }

00427 
00428 void MainboardsWidget::fillReleaseModel( std::string os_id )
00429 {
00430   releaseModel_->removeRows(0, releaseModel_->rowCount());  // reset model..
00431 
00432   std::multimap<std::string,std::string> releaseList_;  
00433   
00434   releaseList_ = queryOsReleases( os_id );  // Get Release list of given Distribution ( releaseID, releaseName ).
00435   
00436   std::vector<WStandardItem *> result;      // Line to be added to releaseModel_.
00437   WStandardItem *item;
00438 
00439   item = new WStandardItem("0");
00440   result.push_back(item);
00441   item = new WStandardItem("Select Release");
00442   result.push_back(item);
00443   releaseModel_->appendRow(result);
00444   result.clear();
00445 
00446   // Iterate through the list of retrieved Releases, while getting their IDs and Names.
00447   std::multimap<std::string,std::string>::iterator release_iter;
00448   for ( release_iter=releaseList_.begin(); release_iter!=releaseList_.end(); ++release_iter ){
00449     item = new WStandardItem( release_iter->first );    // releaseID column
00450     result.push_back(item);
00451     item = new WStandardItem( release_iter->second );   // releaseName column
00452     result.push_back(item);
00453 
00454     releaseModel_->appendRow(result);
00455     result.clear();
00456   }
00457 }

00462   Retrieve Kernels of provided Distribution Release.

00465 std::multimap<std::string,std::string> queryReleaseKernels( std::string release_id );

00467 
00468 void MainboardsWidget::fillKernelModel( std::string release_id )
00469 {
00470   kernelModel_->removeRows(0, kernelModel_->rowCount()); // reset model..
00471 
00472   std::multimap<std::string,std::string> kernelList_;  
00473 
00474   // Get Kernel list of given Release (uKerneID,kernelVersion-machineHardware )
00475   kernelList_ = queryReleaseKernels( release_id ); 
00476   
00477   std::vector<WStandardItem *> result;      // Line to be added to kernelModel_.
00478   WStandardItem *item;
00479 
00480   // Iterate through the list of retrieved Kernels, while getting their IDs and Version-Arch's.
00481   std::multimap<std::string,std::string>::iterator kernel_iter;
00482   for ( kernel_iter=kernelList_.begin(); kernel_iter!=kernelList_.end(); ++kernel_iter ){
00483     item = new WStandardItem( kernel_iter->first );     // uKernelID column
00484     result.push_back(item);
00485     item = new WStandardItem( kernel_iter->second );    // kernelVersion-machineHardware column
00486     result.push_back(item);
00487 
00488     kernelModel_->appendRow(result);
00489     result.clear();
00490   }
00491 }

00493 
00494 void MainboardsWidget::osSelectionChanged( int selected_index )
00495 {
00496   std::stringstream ss;
00497   ss << selected_index;
00498   std::string index = ss.str();
00499 
00500   // Get ID of selected Distribution.
00501   WModelIndex i1 = osModel_->index(comboOS_->currentIndex(),0 );
00502   std::string os_id = (osModel_->itemFromIndex(i1))->text().narrow();
00503 
00504   if( os_id != "0" ){           // if a Distribution is selected
00505     comboRel_->enable();
00506     fillReleaseModel( os_id );  // Fill Releases of the selected Distribution.
00507     comboRel_->setCurrentIndex(0);
00508   }
00509   else{                         // else 'Select OS' is selected..
00510     comboRel_->disable();
00511   }
00512   comboKer_->disable();
00513   comboKer_->setCurrentIndex(0);
00514   bCheckOs_->disable();
00515 }
00516 
00517 
00518 
00519 void MainboardsWidget::releaseSelectionChanged( int selected_index )
00520 {
00521   std::stringstream ss;
00522   ss << selected_index;
00523   std::string index = ss.str();
00524 
00525   // Get ID of selected Release.
00526   WModelIndex i1 = releaseModel_->index(comboRel_->currentIndex(),0 );
00527   std::string release_id = (releaseModel_->itemFromIndex(i1))->text().narrow();
00528 
00529   if( release_id != "0" ){      // if a Release is selected
00530     comboKer_->enable();
00531     fillKernelModel( release_id ); // Fill Kernels of the selected Distribution Release.
00532     comboKer_->setCurrentIndex(0);
00533     bCheckOs_->enable();
00534   }
00535   else{                         // else 'Select Release' is selected.
00536     comboKer_->disable();
00537     bCheckOs_->disable();
00538   }
00539 }
00540 
00541 
00542 std::string MainboardsWidget::getOsIdentifier()
00543 {
00544   // Get the Unique Kernel ID, representing an OS(Distribution-Release-Kernel) ID.
00545   WModelIndex i1 = kernelModel_->index(comboKer_->currentIndex(),0 );
00546   std::string uKernel_id = (kernelModel_->itemFromIndex(i1))->text().narrow();
00547 
00548   if( uKernel_id == "0" )
00549     return "";
00550   return uKernel_id;
00551 }
00552 
00553 
00554 std::string MainboardsWidget::getBoardIdentifier()
00555 {
00556   // Column 0 of the source model holds the IDs for mainboards so retrieve it.
00557   WModelIndex i1 = boardsProxyModel_->index(boardsSelection_->currentIndex(),0 );
00558   WModelIndex i2 = boardsProxyModel_->mapToSource( i1 );
00559 
00560   return ( (mainboards_->itemFromIndex(i2))->text().narrow() );
00561 }

00564 
00565 void MainboardsWidget::bCheckOs_Click()
00566 {
00567   std::string board_id = getBoardIdentifier();      // Get ID of the selected mainboard.
00568 
00569   // Retrieve PCI devices of the mainboard.
00570   std::vector<PciDevice> device_list = getBoardDeviceList( board_id );
00571 
00572   PcimapResultWidget* pcilist;
00573   if ( (pcilist = PcimapResultWidget::Instance()) == NULL ){
00574 
00575     // Switch to PcimapResultWidget providing mainboard name and OS ID too..
00576     selectWidget( PcimapResultWidget::Instance( device_list, parent_,
00577                                                 boardsSelection_->currentText().narrow(),
00578                                                 getOsIdentifier()) );
00579     
00580     // Remove and delete the current instance of MainboardsWidget.
00581     resetAll();
00582     
00583     WApplication::instance()->setInternalPath("/query_results"); // Set URL to point the new page.
00584   }
00585   else
00586     wApp->log("debug") << "PcimapResultWidget already exists! this should NOT happen!";
00587 }

00591 void MainboardsWidget::dialogWarn_Close( WDialog::DialogCode code )
00592 {
00593   delete dialogWarn_;
00594 
00595   if ( code == WDialog::Accepted ){     // User confirmed deletion of mainboard.
00596     deleteBoard();
00597   }
00598 
00599 }
00600 
00601 void MainboardsWidget::refreshPage()
00602 {
00603   resetAll();
00604   selectWidget( MainboardsWidget::Instance( parent_ ) );
00605 }
00606 
00608 void removeWidget( WContainerWidget* widget );
00609 
00610 void MainboardsWidget::resetAll()
00611 {
00612   removeWidget( MainboardsWidget::Instance() );
00613   delete MainboardsWidget::Instance();
00614 }
